title: FTC chief sees obstacle to splitting up Facebook
text: Social network's effort to merge WhatsApp, Messenger and Instagram may help keep the company together too, FTC chief tells the Financial Times.

title: Facebook Inc (FB) COB and CEO Mark Zuckerberg Sold $43.5 million of Shares
text: COB and CEO of Facebook Inc (30-Year Financial, Insider Trades) Mark Zuckerberg (insider trades) sold 237,823 shares of FB on 08/16/2019 at an average price of $182.75 a share.

title: The Wall Street Journal: States preparing joint antitrust investigation of Big Tech
text: WASHINGTON â€” A group of state attorneys general is preparing to move forward with a joint antitrust investigation of big technology companies, according to people familiar with the situation, adding another layer of scrutiny to an industry already under a federal spotlight.

title: Facebook and Twitter Say China Is Spreading Disinformation in Hong Kong
text: The social media companies removed accounts and said they were sowing divisive messages about the Hong Kong protests.

title: Facebook Libra Partner Mastercard Is Building Its Own Cryptocurrency Team
text: Mastercard is building its own cryptocurrency team. The payments giant is a partner in the Facebook Libra project.
